title: Coronavirus Fight Curbs Action Against Other Deadly Diseases - msnNOW
description: Vaccination drives for polio, measles and other diseases are paused, raising fears that other epidemics could surge in the developing world.
content:
© Saiyna Bashir for The Wall Street Journal
 A polio worker vaccinated a 4-year-old boy in Peshawar, Pakistan, in December, a campaign that is now halted.
The coronavirus threat has suspended vaccination campaigns against many other diseases in the developi… [+16390 chars]
